Package GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HomeLayout
    This class generates JFrame for Home page.
    HowToPlay
    Class HowToPlay extends JPanel , is a 8 member of card layout on parent It shows the rules and how to' of playing hand cricket.
    PlayArena1
    This class generates JPanel for first inning.
    PlayArena2
    This class generates JPanel for second inning JPanel with score board and different buttons for game play.
    PlayMode
    Generates new Frame for selecting teams and overs.
    TeamSelection
    This class creates JPanel for team selection JPanel will have buttons for modularity
    Toss
    This class generates JPanel for toss JPanel will consist of buttons and labels
    ViewScore1
    This class creates JPanel for Score card
    ViewScore2
